data.eml:eml: A new species of Amentotaxus (Taxaceae) from China, Vietnam, and Laos

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gao, Lian-Ming, Tan, Shao-Lin, Zhang, Gui-Liang, Thomas, Philip (2019): A new species of Amentotaxus (Taxaceae) from China, Vietnam, and Laos. PhytoKeys 130: 25-32, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.130.33956, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.130.33956
